item.title: What’s on the Thanksgiving Table? A Stock Pick for Every Course
item.description: Seaboard, Campbell’s, General Mills, McCormick, and Constellation Brands match every Thanksgiving course—with stocks that could rise this season.

item.title: Why Home Depot’s Pain Could Be a Long-Term Investor’s Gain
item.description: Home Depot's Q4 2025 price pullback is a great time to load up on this buy-and-hold stock. The stage is set for a 2026 rebound.

item.title: Qualcomm’s Bulls Are Running Out of Room to Be Wrong
item.description: Qualcomm’s 20% drop means the bulls have given up all their post-earnings gains, and are once again on the backfoot defending a key support line.

item.title: Amazon Just Did This—and It Didn't End Well Last Time
item.description: Amazon’s RSI crash mirrors last year's setup that preceded a 35% drop. But strong fundamentals would make any dip a major buy this time around.

item.title: Merck Writes a $9.2 Billion Check for a Flu Drug That Could Change Everything
item.description: Merck's multi-billion-dollar acquisition of Cidara Therapeutics is a strategic move to secure a new era of growth with a high-potential antiviral asse...
